mapper.select: select * from vovage where fly_city = #{flyCity} order by vovage_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into vovage (vovage_id, flight_id, ticket_date, fly_time, arrived_time, fly_city, arrived_city, price) values (#{vovageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flightId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ticketDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{flyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{arrivedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flyCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivedCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER})

vovage_id,

price,

mapper.update:
update vovage
flight_id = #{flightId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ticket_date = #{ticketDate,jdbcType=DATE},
fly_time = #{flyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
arrived_time = #{arrivedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fly_city = #{flyCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
arrived_city = #{arrivedCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where vovage_id = #{vovageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
